revision.comment: SoC does not in fact have Ethernet capability! Ethernet is implemented via PCIe interface.
revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=SimpleWAN |model=Advanced |revision=2 (SW302DA-NA) |manuf_country=Switzerland |is_manuf=No |manuf=PC Engines |manuf_model=apu.2c |type=Router Firewall |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=AMD |cpu1_model=GX-412HC;GE412TIYJ44JB; |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64JVSIQ |fla2=4 GiB |fla2_brand=Phison |fla2_model=SD Card |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G0846F-BYK0 |ram1_num=8 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 3.0 (Type A), mSATA, SATA |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Intel |eth_chip1_model=WGI211AT |eth_chip2_brand=Intel |eth_chip2_model=WGI211AT |eth_chip3_brand=Intel |eth_chip3_model=WGI211AT |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Super I/O Chipset;Nuvoton;NCT5104D;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input NAND Gate;On Semi;74VHCT00A;;1;,,, Integrated Power Supply Controller;O2Micro;OZ812;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3243C;;1;,,, 2 + 1 Phase DC/DC for AMD CPU;O2Micro;OZ8321LN;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Anpec;APL5930;;1;,,, 3A 5V 1MHz Synchronous Buck Converter;Anpec;APW8804;;1;,,, High-Performance Notebook PWM Controller;Anpec;APW8828;;1;,,, 30V Dual Asymmetric N-Channel AlphaMOS;Alpha & Omega;AON7934;;6;,,, Dual Ultra High Efficiency DC/DC w/ 5V Regulator & Switch-Over;O2Micro;OZ8153LN;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, SIM Card slot, SD Card slot, buzzer, heatsink, metal case |stock_boot=CoreBoot;SeaBIOS;1.10.0.1; |stock_os=FreeBSD |oui_eth=00:0D:B9 }} {{TagLine|SimpleWAN Advanced}} :[https://support.simplewan.com/portal/en/kb/articles/setting-up-your-unit SetUp Guide] [https://www.pcengines.ch/apu2c2.htm OEM Info]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[AMD]]'' GX-412TC @1.0GHz Quad-core 64bit X86 *Storage: 8MB SPI Flash, 4GB SD Card, mSATA, SATA *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 3x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 3.0 host port *PCI: 2x Mini PCIe slots *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:SimpleWAN 2 SD302DA-NA Top.jpeg|Board Top File:SimpleWAN 2 SD302DA-NA Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
